Bils blasting ball was a little-known spell of sardonic nature created by the wizard Bil long before 1261 DR.
Bils blasting ball was developed by a wizard of small repute Bil, who was mostly known for creating a highly sought after jade shield ring. He disappeared from the Realms in 1261 DR, and all of his belongings and works were scavenged by his acquaintances of ill repute and sold off to the highest bidder.
